summary: This document is an email exchange between Paul Morris and Caroline Kitidis regarding a meeting agenda for an upcoming meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes instructions for preparing materials for the meeting and highlights the roles of the individuals involved at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Private Bank and is coordinating a meeting agenda related to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Caroline V. Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is the Americas Head of Key Client Partners & Wealth Investment Coverage at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, involved in preparing for a meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank and are collaborating on meeting preparations.

events.title: JE Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled to discuss matters related to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Floor, New York, NY 10154
345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 21, 2013.
Paul Morris and Caroline Kitidis are both managing directors at Deutsche Bank.
The meeting agenda is related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline Kitidis requested a professional version of the meeting materials to be prepared.
The document is marked as confidential.
